text:
When calling another build file using the <ant> task the basedir of the called
target is forced to be the same as the dir attribute on the <ant> task. The
basedir attribute on the called <project> is ignored.

The work around is to set the dir attribute to be the desired basedir and then
specify a relative path in the antfile attribute.

text:
I just realized that the documentation on the <ant> task explicitely says for
the dir attribute: "This will override the basedir setting of the called project".

Next time I will read the docs properly, sorry.

As a side note, I don't see why was this behavior implemented, but there must of
been a reason for it.
